Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch FEATURES 14k gold-plated two-tone brass 47mm hunter case with a matching curb chain Skeleton dial with roman numerals 17 jewel mechanical movement Deluxe gift box DESCRIPTION Traditional yet timely in its own way, this two-tone brass finished pocket watch is a must-have. It features precise engineering, thanks to 17 jewel mechanical movement. A white-trim skeleton dial has black Roman numeral hour indicators for clarity and crisp details. Skeleton dial. Roman numerals. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k gold-plated. Two- tone brass finish. 1.85 in. Dia. Featuring a two-tone crest design on its case back, classic profile, and skeleton dial with black-tone Roman numeral hour markers, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch 3711 is both elegant and understated. Seventeen-jewel mechanical movement ensures reliable time-keeping, while black-tone Roman numeral hour markers and three black-tone hands stand out against a creamy white background. Complete with a matching curb chain, this Charles-Hubert original arrives in a deluxe blue gift-box.
